body:
Hey guys, here's the first episode of a new map review series that I decided to start. I'll be reviewing 2 maps each episode, and talking about the rushing/defending strategies on the map. So for the first episode, I'll be talking about Senex and Formorgar. Enjoy! :D

http://youtu.be/KRq6d5YKc6c
body_tagged:

http://youtu.be/KRq6d5YKc6c
title: Nebula Map Review #1

replies.body:
Thanks! Good rusher as always x)
It's great hearing your reviews on these maps, since I'm making my own (you already know) and I need to know from a very opinionated person what I should work on :D

replies.body: You should review other maps, not just nebula!
replies.body_tagged: You should review other maps, not just nebula!

replies.body: Can you please turn your game sounds down a bit? They were quite loud in the video.
replies.body_tagged: Can you please turn your game sounds down a bit? They were quite loud in the video.

replies.body: Why do you take your armour off and fight naked? o-o
replies.body_tagged: Why do you take your armour off and fight naked? o-o

reply_to.body: Why do you take your armour off and fight naked? o-o
reply_to.body_tagged: Why do you take your armour off and fight naked? o-o

replies.body:
Because that's apparently what rushers do.
Also, he has an enderman skin which is dark, so it could be hard to see him visibly during the night (especially in void maps.)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I might do some Nexus maps as well, but I rarely play the rest of the gamemodes and I don't know any of the maps. If the game sounds are too loud, I'll turn them down a bit.

@croc That's correct :P
Before, with a full black skin, I was pretty much invisible in Quintus. You'd just see a bridge building itself. Now, you'd see a pair of floating purple eyes

replies.body: I used to have a black skin, and on quintus I was bridging to a full dia guy (using x-Ray TP) and he couldn't see me :Pso I broke his monument and reported him (he said he used in chat and that was proof)
